Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さん、 おはようございます……
Entry.EnglishText: Good morning, <Tytree>...

Entry.JapaneseText: べ、別にさぼっておったわけじゃ ありませんよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm not slacking off, sir...!

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナの弟か……
Entry.EnglishText: You're Selena's younger brother, aren't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉ちゃんに会ったら、 ヒューマだからって偉そうにするな、 と言っておけ。
Entry.EnglishText: When you see her, tell her to stop being so haughty just because she's a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえもな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...That goes for you too, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたもガジュマなら、 ヒューマなんかと 歩くのはやめたらどうだ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're a Gajuma, so you might want to stop walking alongside those Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: そいつらは 血も涙もない連中だぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Heed my words, those Huma are a cruel lot.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマめが…… いつか、仕返しを……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll get my revenge, just you wait, Huma bastards!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの言いなりには ならんぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never listen to you damn Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 特におまえみたいに 工場にも行かず、ブラブラしてる ろくでなしの言いなりにはな！
Entry.EnglishText: Especially one who just wanders around and can't even be bothered to go to the factory!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマと一緒に 旅をしてるじゃと!?
Entry.EnglishText: You're traveling with Huma!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえさんは よほどの幸せ者じゃな……
Entry.EnglishText: You... must have had a blessed life...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシらのような目にあったなら、 そんな事は絶対できまいて……
Entry.EnglishText: If you've been through what I have, you'd never do such a thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマめが…… いつか、仕返しを……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll get my revenge, just you wait, Huma bastards!

Entry.JapaneseText: もうおまえら ヒューマの言いなりにはならん！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never listen to what you say, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: これからはガジュマの時代じゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: The Era of Gajuma is now!

Entry.JapaneseText: これからはガジュマの時代じゃ！ ジルバ様がそうおっしゃったと、 工場の者たちがそう騒いでおる。
Entry.EnglishText: As Lady Zilva said, and as the factory workers shout out: The Era of Gajuma is now!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなどと歩かず、 そろそろその事を認識した方がよいぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's about time you realized that and stopped walking alongside Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: いずれヒューマはこの地上から いなくなるのだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: There will come a time where there are no more Huma in this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、ヒューマめ…… いい気味じゃ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... That'll serve them right.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんて ロクなもんじゃない！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are good for nothing!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一緒に旅してるんなら、 あんたもわかるだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure you know that well, after traveling alongside them.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこの街へ行っても ヒューマは同じだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are the same no matter where you go.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらがどこから来たか、知らんが、 おんなじなんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea where you all are from, but you're all the same nonetheless.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ワシはヒューマを 誤解していたのか…… いやいや……そんな事は ないはずじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: Was I wrong about Huma all this time...? N-No... That can't be the case...

Entry.JapaneseText: 地面が揺れておる…… なんじゃ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What...? The ground's shaking...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場の問題は解決に 向かいつつある。
Entry.EnglishText: Our issues at the factory are gradually being resolved.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの中にも いい奴と悪い奴がいるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guess there are good and bad amongst Huma as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場長…… 奴は意外といい奴だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Factory Manager... He's surprisingly nice.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの中にも いい奴と悪い奴が いる事がわかったのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Guess there are good and bad amongst Huma as well... I've come to learn that.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたらは…… いい奴か？ 悪い奴か？
Entry.EnglishText: How about you...? Are you good... or are you bad?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は煙突の町と 呼ばれておる。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is known as a town of smokestacks.

Entry.JapaneseText: ほれ、家の屋根屋根に煙突が たくさん見えておるじゃろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Look up there, you can see lots of 'em sticking out from the roofs.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに、工場の煙突も……な？
Entry.EnglishText: And from the factory too, see?

Entry.JapaneseText: 働かざる者 食うべからず
Entry.EnglishText: He who does not work, shall not eat.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、帰ってきたら、 しっかり働くんじゃぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll make sure to whip you into shape when you come back, <Tytree>!
